description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -	Create Investment Order (IO) for CIP, update CIP file, CIP report for annual audit purpose
              
              -	Create new fixed assets (FA), run depreciation, update FAR, conduct periodic FA count and adjust for variances (if any)
              
              -	Update and monitor land lease (new contracts/decisions for new areas, contract expire), accrue land lease
              
              -	Month-end closing tasks: check bank & cash reconciliation, IO settlement, check clearing AR, AP and FX revaluation, reverse and book goods in transit, prepare notes for the FS, revert ad accrue copper hedging loss/gain, accrue shared costs with group
              
              -	Liaise with Finance team to check and record for intracompany loans and related interest expense
              
              -	Make payment, filing documents, book accounting entries into SAP for 3 standalone companies under MSR group
              
              -	Prepare monthly financial reports (balance sheet, income statement, cash flow, statement of changes in equity) for 3 standalone companies under MSR group
              
              -	Assist in month and quarter end Group consolidation reports for Group Reporting
              
              -	Prepare monthly/quarterly/annually compliance reports on statistics, bond, investment implementation, monitoring
              
              -	Prepare monthly/quarterly/annually declaration/finalization/payment for all taxes of 3 standalone companies under MSR group
              
              -	Assisting to manage financial audits with external auditors, bankers, lawyers
              
              -	Participate in and support special projects as required
              
              -	Meet established internal and external deadlines to ensure timely financial reporting and maintain monthly tracking of external submissions and other key metrics
              
              -	Liaise with various internal departments to provide reports or information as required
              
              -	Support, coach and lead the Accountants, Juniors and/or Graduates as required
              
              -	Assist with the design and implementation of accounting and finance processes and internal controls
              
              -	Assist with Tax planning and to ensure compliance with all statutory tax requirements and legislation
              
              -	Other works as assigned
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              -	 University graduation, major in Accounting and Finance
              
              -	Chartered Accountant or equivalent e.g. CIMA, ACCA, ACA, CPA or Vietnamese Chief Accounting certification (part qualified will be considered)
              
              -	Experience with one of the Big 4 companies is a plus in audit or tax
              
              -	A minimum of 4 years financial experience in commercial and/or public practice with 1 to 2 years at a senior level
              
              -	Familiarity with IFRS / IAS / VAS and group consolidation accounting
              
              -	Experience in dealing with all levels of government officials especially in banking, finance and tax
              
              -	Mining and/or construction industry experience desirable, but not required
              
              -	Knowledge and experience in taxation for mining companies
              
              -	Knowledge and application of capital expenditure protocols
              
              -	Sound commercial acumen and accountability for bottom-line reporting, including financial outcomes
              
              -	SAP ERP
              
              -	English-proficient
              
              -	Strong managerial skills and ability to solve problems
              
              -	Must be organised and detail oriented but also be able to step back and think strategically
              
              -	Good written, analytical and verbal communication as well as interpersonal skills
              
              -	Ability to work under pressure and to meet tight deadlines
              
              -	Willingness to learn, grow, develop and coach
              
              -	Work requires willingness to work a flexible schedule and a self starter
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
